name: Age of Rivals
description: Deep civilization-building strategy in a fast-paced card game! There are many paths to victory in this competitive card drafting game featuring 12 unique characters and hundreds of cards ranging from great pyramids and war elephants to sneaky spies and crafty merchants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space
